title: <no title>
body:
Drive: Checking the Access of a File

Every file in the Maha Drive has an owner (the user who has uploaded the file or a user to whom the ownership was transferred).
The other access privileges are viewing files and editing files (which includes viewing).
If you would like to check which users have which access privileges to file, follow the steps below

  1. Click in the ribbon

  2. Click Drive

  3. Click My Drive (or Starred Items if you have starred the file)

  4. Click on the appropriate folders until you have navigated to the desired file

    • Alternatively, search for your file

  5. Click your file once

  6. In the info tab, click Access

  7. View the Owner and all the users and/or groups who can View and/or Edit the file
